rules.natural: If Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X, then Regulation 2024 requires safety protocols for Factory X.

Under the condition that Regulation 2024 requires safety protocols for Factory X, if Factory X has a safety supervisor, then in the event that Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.
If Factory X has a compliance certificate, then Factory X uses approved materials.
Provided that Factory X has a compliance certificate, Factory X does not follow emission standards.
Either Factory X has a compliance certificate, or it is not the case that Factory X is an approved facility.
Under the condition that Factory X uses approved materials, Factory X follows emission standards.
Factory X has a safety supervisor or Factory X has an automated safety system.
Whenever Factory X has an automated safety system, if Factory X is using flammable solvents, then Factory X is not operating at full capacity.
In the event that new legislation Regulation 2024 has been passed, Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X.
If it is not the case that having a compliance certificate implies Factory X follows emission standards, then Factory X is operating at full capacity.
Under the condition that it is not true that having a compliance certificate leads to Factory X following emission standards, Factory X is using flammable solvents.
If a government inspection is not scheduled for Factory X, then Factory X is an approved facility.

facts.natural: New legislation named Regulation 2024 has been passed.

target.natural: A government inspection is scheduled for Factory X.

Factory X does not have a compliance certificate.
It is not the case that Factory X is an approved facility.
A government inspection is scheduled for Factory X.

Provided that Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X, if Factory X has a safety supervisor, then whenever Factory X is using flammable solvents, it is not the case that Factory X is operating at full capacity.

If Factory X has a safety supervisor, then in the case that Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.
Whenever Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.
Provided that it is false that if Factory X has a compliance certificate, then Factory X follows emission standards, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.
Whenever Factory X has a compliance certificate, Factory X follows emission standards.
Factory X does not have a compliance certificate.

A government inspection is scheduled for Factory X.

(A10 → (A7 → (A6 → ¬A5))).natural: Provided that Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X, if Factory X has a safety supervisor, then whenever Factory X is using flammable solvents, it is not the case that Factory X is operating at full capacity.

(A10 → A11).natural: If Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X, then Regulation 2024 requires safety protocols for Factory X.

(A11 → (A7 → (A6 → ¬A5))).natural: Under the condition that Regulation 2024 requires safety protocols for Factory X, if Factory X has a safety supervisor, then in the event that Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.

(A2 → A3).natural: Whenever Factory X has a compliance certificate, Factory X follows emission standards.

(A2 → A4).natural: If Factory X has a compliance certificate, then Factory X uses approved materials.

(A2 → ¬A3).natural: Provided that Factory X has a compliance certificate, Factory X does not follow emission standards.

(A2 ∨ ¬A1).natural: Either Factory X has a compliance certificate, or it is not the case that Factory X is an approved facility.

(A4 → A3).natural: Under the condition that Factory X uses approved materials, Factory X follows emission standards.

(A6 → ¬A5).natural: Whenever Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.

(A7 → (A6 → ¬A5)).natural: If Factory X has a safety supervisor, then in the case that Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Factory X has a safety supervisor or Factory X has an automated safety system.

(A8 → (A6 → ¬A5)).natural: Whenever Factory X has an automated safety system, if Factory X is using flammable solvents, then Factory X is not operating at full capacity.

(A9 → (A7 → (A6 → ¬A5))).natural: If new legislation Regulation 2024 has been passed, then provided that Factory X has a safety supervisor, whenever Factory X is using flammable solvents, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.

(A9 → A10).natural: In the event that new legislation Regulation 2024 has been passed, Regulation 2024 applies to Factory X.

(¬(A2 → A3) → A5).natural: If it is not the case that having a compliance certificate implies Factory X follows emission standards, then Factory X is operating at full capacity.

(¬(A2 → A3) → ¬A5).natural: Provided that it is false that if Factory X has a compliance certificate, then Factory X follows emission standards, Factory X is not operating at full capacity.

(¬G → A1).natural: If a government inspection is not scheduled for Factory X, then Factory X is an approved facility.
